description: Rod Daily is all tuckered out after a crazy night of fun. James Jameson and Nash Lawler see this as a golden opportunity to raise a little hell! When James decides to rub his dick on Rod's sleeping face, hilarity ensues and Rod soon finds himself the butt of a prank gone haywire!It's a recipe for hot, three-way morning sex with this frisky trio. The old ballsack alarm clock routine was a good idea, as James finds himself receiving passionate fellacio from Rod. Nash doesn't waste an opportunity to take care of Rod's throbbing meat. Then it's Dutch door action as Nash and James take turns pounding Rod's sweet, muscular ass. What a way to start the day!Enjoy!
series: R028 - Rod Daily,Nash Lawler & James Jameson
title: Early Morning Tomfoolery
